values:
So last night i went to the JJ varsity football game! Soo much funn!! It went into over time and then we won the game! it was crazy! So i was hanging out with Sarah the whole time but her and I went back a fourth between the 8th graders and our group of friends...it was fun!! Then sarah left so i was with the 8th graders then right when we won i walked over near chloe and molly and natalie etc. I finallllyyy got my livestrong! it was about time! ya so i just woke up and i'm bored and tired, call me if u wanna do somethin today!! lyl xox

PeAcE

ya JoHn JaY!

Wow i really gotta keep this thing updated ok so here we go... 

well yesturday Dave rofo and i got in a huuuuuuuuuuuuuuge fight and we both totally overreacted! and we were like apologizing and we were like telling each other our point and it was really fun! lol so now we're cool thank god cuz i soo didnt wanna fight with him...so he was like i love u and iwas like i love u too!!! lol it was an emotional moment!! haha

ok so now molly and i are at natalies having sooooooooo much fun!! we like pissed off will o and he signed off on us randomly...lol mollys upset at him! haha woa that doesnt make sence "upset at him" haha anyway so b4 the soda bottle carried a mind of its own and randomly exploded ALL over the wall and the carbet and natty screamed so i thought the house was on fire and i f-in freaked!! it was scary!! lol so now we're having sooo much fun  talkin online and pigging out ((haha i had the weirdest craving for doughnuts so we bought like a dozen hehe)) ya, piggin out thats what we do best! lol anywayy!! so ya...7th grade is so much fun! so much drama and JUICE!! hahaha srry...ya this is so fun! lol anyway....i established who i'm going to marry!! and when i do marry him, i'm gonna come bac and laugh cuz u all want him but i gettt him!! hahaha...woa day dreamin again lol anyway i'm gonna hang with my BEST FRIENDS FOR LIFE!!! xoxox mwa PEACE

haha yesturday afternoon when we were packing up to go home greg d comes up to me with a bumper stick that says horny toad on it and hes like "look horny toad" so i started cracking uppp and i was bent over and someone pushed me so my head went into my locker and i was laughing so hard that i coudlnt get it out!so then i was late for FH so i had all my clothes bundled up in a heap in my hands and i dropped all of it plus the stuff in my bag cuz i was laughing sooo hard!! lol it was a classic!!Ok so we had another FH game and we lost, this grl also slammed me to the ground and gave me majjjooorrr wip lash and now my back and neck hurts! lol ouch...she did that to about 6 other grls on our team and she smacked one grl in the wrist with her stick...vicious! so we ended up losing, and the other team was like "burn JJ" so that was retarded! but anyhoo then i got home and did my Hw, nothing totally exciting happened in school except for the fact that carolyn fine told about her whole band class that i'm going out with will when i'm deffinatly not!!! for god sakes i wanna stay single! lol so ya, i have ccd in a half an h0ur,joy! lol actually it can be fun cuz all my friends are in it. And right now natalie and i are having a gr8 convo! lol  but i'm gonna go ttyl PeAcE

xox

Ok so yesturday we had a field hockey game and technically we won 3-1 but it got all messed up so we tied 1-1...grr! anywhoo all the 8th grade guys were there and it was sooooooo funny, they made a pyrimid and were screaming...it was histerical!! SO after that my mom took me to villarinas and go a jayster ((yummmmm)) and we dropped michelle off then i took a shower and babysat for like 4 hours, got home at like 12:00 went to bed at 12:30, and now i just woke up lol..a bit tired, later i'm going to the mall to go $hopping!!!! SwEeEeT! lol..so i'll ttyl peace

xox

Ok so, school was cool today! FH was even cooler!! we were all splatting mud at each other then we all go yelled at but mimi and chloe did it again and they had to run an extra lap! haha it was a classic! then we practiced corners and stuff, it was so wett and funnnn!! lol but i gg study for spanish, oh god! lol ttyl peace

xox

ok so, school today was reallllly fun! but i'm so mixed up about stuff! ahh! i dunno how i feel, i duno if i still like Brett even though i know its over, ahhh! I guess it's time to let go! besides we're still friends anyway!! lindsay labriolas a bitch and i hope shes reading this right now, she needs to get over it. mike and I are cool now but she cant fricken let go, it was 6th grade and ur wasting ur time on a 7th grader, honestly u fricken look like u have no life, so u can get a life now..well glad i got that out lol anyhoo...field hockey was kinda boring and i'm sooo bored right now and tired so i'm gonna go ttyl xo mwa

omg i havent updated in sooooooooo long! well this weekend i went to VT with chloe and it was sooooooo much funnn!! we went to Bromley and went on these Alpine slides it was so awesome!! Yesturday Brett and I broke uo =/ it's ok though cuz we're still friends and hes being really cool about it! Hes so nice! Everyones like omg! it was kinda random but i like being single...te he...and i wasnt so upset, like i was upset for about 2 minutes and then i was fine, i was at natalies house, i kinda saw is coming though cuz i heard a "rumor" but it really wasnt...that he was gonna dump me so i was like wtf! and so i called him and he did dump me ((obviously)) but he was nice so i was fine ((a lot better than mike...if ur reading this get tips from brett mike)) i almost think it's better that we're friends cuz he was talking to me online and it felt different but not bad...so anyhoo field hockey scrimmage was canceled! yay! lol dunno why i'm happy about that and school was ok today, my mood kinda went down towards the end of the day, i was fine in the morning then i started to miss the relashionship thingy, oh well things happen for a reason i guess. I also had a lot of mood swings..haha. SO now i'm finishing up HW and i continue to hate mrs langan cuz shes a f-in bitch head! ugh and i had to see her twice today cuz our schedule was all messed up from the emergency dissmissal drill thingy. Well i'm gonna go ttyl peace 

xox

wowzers i havent updated in forever!! all i can say is school sux total butt...mrs. langan in awfulllll, but field hockey is really fun, i'm on the white team and we got to watch the varsity game today! They're so good (( a lot better than we are!)) lol we also practiced which is good...istead of pure running. I got a 70 on my science lab cuz i forgot to fill in one smallll blank and draw a line on the ruler, thats 30 points! i shouldve gotten like only 10 points off, not even! I had a ss quiz today,  pretty easy, and i got a 94 on my math quiz and a 29 out of 30 on my spanish quiz..nicee lol so i'm hungry and tired so i'm gonna go rest lyl xox mwa

PeAcE

So yesturday I spent the whole say with Molly again =], yay! So we were gonna go into town for Katonah Sales day, but it got canceled cuz of the rain, but we still went anyway just for fun! lol and we saw Sarah b, Lexi, and Catherine together in town so we hung out with them. We went to Boo girls and the lady there was a bitch and she almost kicked us out. We didnt even do anything...ugh i hate her, that store pisses me off a lot cuz the ppl in there are sooo snobby...ugh anyhoo, so then we went and got sushi, and sarah got realllllllyyyy good pizza so we all ate hers..ha! And catherine, sarah, and lexi wanted to get their nails done so they went and did that and molly and i went around and shopped, then we met up with them again, got candy and it started raing so we went to the library and Mollys brother came to pick us up so we left. Then we hung out at molly, went to babaysit, made some $$ went home and max had like a million ppl over, we made pasta for them...haha and tthen i slept over, and now i'm home!! lots of fun!!!  but omg summers almost over and its freeeeezing out today!!! It's like a fall day...ugh i'm so cold =[...lol well i'mm gonna go cuz my parents are making me go to my booooring cousins house so i have to finish my HW....ttyl mwa PeAcE

xox

So, yesturday i had a bunch of ppl over! It was really fun...we just kinda hung out....It was Molly, mimi, natalie, caity, sarah, and chloe, some ppl had to leave earlier though. Mollys over today! yay! omg we're sooo tired!!!! YaWn...we watched 50 first dates, GoOd MoViE!!!! oh ya, and last night Alan and Mike like cursed me out..ha i didnt care at all...i was just sitting there like...r u done yet? Lucie was like eww creepy!! it was...they said something else really weird too...=/ ugg lol anyhoo...i'm getting this room in our house re-done and they put these really cool lights in today! lol....so ya i'm getting reallllly tired, i'm gonna go, ttyl Mwa PeAcE

xox Molly & Erica

 

                        

We Be RaIsInG tHe R0oF...w0o0t w0o0t!!!

Havent updated for a little while...lots to tell...lunch yesturday was uhh interesting...lol! Sarah, Mimi, Brett, and Perry ganged up on me and kept picking on me!! haha Sarah ended up cutting me with a plastice knife ((how nice!!)) and i got made fun of...o what a wonderful group of friends...and boyfriend!! which is the saddest part! lol then i got ice cream thrown at me and chips smooshed on me...hmm anything else? no...lol but anyway...yesturday field hockey was a running practice..not much fun...today was ok, we had to run 3/4 of a mile, do sprints, and then we got to practice actual field hockey which was really cool! finally lol!! Lunch today was good too...but more funn arguing..haha wow..ya and brett promised to teach me this song that he said was "funny" but he never did!!!! He said he had to "warm up" and he said hed teach me at the end of the day... so then i saw him b4 we left for buses and he said he couldnt tell me it was too secretive...so i begged for like 3 minutes..then i gave up..lol i'll work on it more tomarrow!!! mwa haha!! And this morning when i was walking to the buses the'r were 4 helicopters hovering enar Mt. Holly which is basically over my house cuz there was a huuuuge fire in one of the mantions on this rich ppl street ((lol)) and the roof callapsed which was scary but the house was being renovated so no one was living in it and no one got hurt..phewww!! but it was on the news and it was really freaky...all the ppl on my street thought we were gonna have a lockdown drill cuzz we thought some creeeepy person got out! ya...and then we had that stupid bus drill where i almost fell when i jumped out the thingy...ya i didnt realize it was that high...haha well i'm gonna go study for spanish...wa-hooo!!! ttyl xox PeAcE

Ly Brett    xox Erica xox

Ya so yesturday i got a call from the doctor saying that i have lime disease...greattt...then i went to a 9/11 memorial for my brothers civil air patrol thingy...it was really sad =[..so then we went out to chinese...got in a fight with my family cuzz they're stupid sometimes...went home..got in another fight with my brother cuz he wouldnt help me with microsoft word even though he lost the thing that fixes it..he finally got it and it still didnt work so i got even more pissed...then i watched a repeat of saturday night live ((haha so funnnnnyyyy)) then i went to bed...now i'm awake and about to die at my boring block party with caroline...haha so i gtg ttyl peace

xox

I'm at natalies right now...=] yay!! lol i slept over last night and molly was there but she had to go home....we hadd soo much funn!! we jumped into the pool at night with sox on..haha and we forgot that we left them out there so we had to runnn out and get them b4 her momm saw them, it was funny! hehe...then we pigged out// ate dinner at like 10:00 haha and stuff like that...we already planned stuff for halloween...ya thats sadd lol!! well i'm gonna go ttyl peace

xox

9/11/01....we remember the tragic times that were meant to bring america down but only made us stronger...we feel for the families that lost love ones and young lives that were lost...

School started today!! I'm mroe happy than sad....i'm just sad that summers over but i'm glad to see everyone!! It was soooo much fun! Caity,Michelle,and emmy d are in my acedemics!! yay!! And of course Bretts not in any of my classes except for lunch but oh well! Sarah and mimi are in like all of his classes...and Perrys in all my acedemics (sarahs boyfriend)..its so weird!Chloe,hannah,and em might be in my unified arts depending on how they split it up! yay!!!! On the bus ride to school i sat with hannah and when high school got off we started talking to this new 6th grader who happens to be in my homebase!! I think i scared her alittle but though...lol!!

So anyway..walking to the buses it was POURING but it was fun cuz sarah and i were walking without shoes on! Chloe couldnt find her bus so she was walking everywhere lol! She got even more soaked...so i dried off a bit on the bus, then i got soaked again coming from the bus to my house!! My brother and i were running...but that made it worse....plus i couldnt run so fast cuz i had flip flops on! So now i'm just hanging out and Molly might come over soon! ((yay))so i'm gonna go ttyl PeAcE

xox

omg!! 2 things...1: school starts tomarrow and i'm fucked 2: my parents might get us a doggie!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! omg i'm so excited....just pray that they say YES!!!!!!!!!!!! ttyl PeAcE

xox mwa

ya, so yesturday was my family reunion...it was fun...got to see my cousins! Chloe came but she left early and i saw a bunch of ppl at the pool....then i got home and i got sick...i had a really bad headache.. my mom thinks it's a sinus headache....it's coming back now...ouch =[...so today I just rested watched the yankee game, they FINALLY won...jeez its been so long lol! I still have faith in them...i'm a loyal fan!!! And then I had a weird temptation to draw with crayons so i just did that (weird temptation) and the worst part is i did it while watching mary-kate and ashley!! ahh!! lol well i'm gonna go ttyl PeAcE

xox

I'm a genius!!!!! I just cracked a case!!! lol Hannah knows she can tell u!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
New club-- the IHR club...me and hannah started it!! woo hoo....its a tea party club!! lol hannah cant wait for the funn filled bus ride!!!!!!!!!!!! lyl xox

Today I went to the track with Natalie to  get ready for field hockey! Yay! lol we're gonna be in shape..ha cough cough...anyways we ran and then we practiced for field hockey...then we were done early so we went down to the middle school to use the pay phone but we needed to call collect and Nat.'s moms cell phone blocked collect calls..which was soo annoying so we walked back up and saw Mrs. Nastasi, Ms. Macsweeney and someone else I dunno her name..ahhh schools starting!! We also saw Sarah B. practicing for soccer!! So after we walked back  up to the field we practiced more and then natalies sister amanda came and picked us up...so then we went to camerons but the line was too long so we went to villarinas and got wraps =] yumMmMmM!!! Then on the way home we blasted Queen on the radio...(i looove queen) and we all knew the words!! lol it was soo funn...so then when we got home natalie and I read magezines...then we went swimming for the rest of the time...Very refreshing!!!We also played mermaid!! hahahahahha!!! L M A O natalie!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! then sammy nardozzi came and then my daddy came to pick us up...and now i'm her being bored and TIRED!!! lol so i'll ttyl mwa PeAcE'

xox

Yesturday i biked i mile and a quarter...i need to get in shape for field hockey!! lol....ya i'm gonna suck at first...but anyway, i basically hung out did nothing...it was a nice day...we ordered chinese take-out..finally!!! lol well i'm gonna go ttyl PeAcE mwa

xox Erica

Well, i just got back from 4 days at the beach...it was ok....too many little kids...there were i think like 7 little kids and one TV and no air conditioning! ahhh!! lol We stayed at my dads best friends house...i made friends! Maria and Sandra and i slept over their house once...our dads knew each other but we had neevr met...it was so funny, mrs.beobide let maria drive the golf cart (they travel in the neighborhood with those almost everyone has one) and shes 15 so she has no driving experience and at first she was so bad i was like screaming it as sooo funny...but mr. beobide would get soo mad if he saw her driving it alone..and he saw us but we were stopped at her house and we tols her mrs. b was inside....we lied it was funny but scary cyuz he wouldve KILLED us...lol Then they had this little town right off the beach (it was soo nice every house and place was in walking distance even the beach!!!) and there was this place called the carousel shop w/ ice cream and candy and cool little things like that! Mr. b. had told all the kids about the lady thatworks at the italian ice stand (reallllyyyy good ices) and how she wont give u a spoon if u want one and how shes bitch...so sandra, maria, andrew, and i all went and i got an ice and andrew was like "can she get a spoon w/ that" and the lady was all nasty and said no...here i'll juss write the convo out..

Andrew- Can she get a spoon w/ that?

Bitch lady (in nasty tone)- nooo

Andrew- well whynot

bitch lady (in nasty tone)- cuz its an italian ice, you dont need a spoon for an ice

Andrew- well....what if someone was autistic and couldnt hold it right

(maria sandra and i are cracking up)

Bitch lady (makes face and andrew)- 1.75$

(we all walk away as andrew says....) This would be a lot more fun to eat w. a spoon!! hahaha it was funny..lol

so anyway the trip was hellish but kinda fun...the whol time we were beggin our parents for a puppy and whenn i got home i found out brett got a puppy so i got very jelous...lol hes so lucky!!!!! I WANT A DOGGYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY lol we've been begging forever...anyway i'm gonna go ttyl xox mwa

 

xox Erica

I slept over natalies last night w. some other ppl...it was soooo much funnn! Nat, emily molly and I....we watched lion king 1 1/2...deaf the best movie ever!! lol Natalie lemme borrow all her sims expansion packs!! SO now i have all them for free!!! woo hoooo!!!!! annnddddd ya it was just so much fun..hmm watching the yankess game 8th inning yankees winning vs. cleveland...3-2! they're prollay gonna lose..lol i have faith! well i'm gonna go ttyl peace mwa

xox Erica
Emmy d. is on my team! yay!!!!!!!!!

Heyy, I haven't updated in a while!Last night I went to the movies with Molly! yay shes finally back from camp! We wentt for pizza at like 10:00 lol..shes coming over later :)! I might get a voice coach too!! woo hooo!! I woke up at 7 am to watch olympic softball and it turned out that it didn't come on until fricken 9!! i was so mad! lol I had to watch basketball first and I fell asleep..so then my brother came down w/ like a million blankets and layed down on the floor and watched  it with me..the i accidently spilt a cup of ice water on him ....i swear it was an accident =/ lol! and sooo ya now i'm here....i'm gonna go ttyl Mwa  PeAcE

xox Erica

Just got back from the beach...omg i love it up there its soo nice...we stayed at  hotel for one night since we already went on vaca. The hotel is puuure CRAP but we didnt wanna spend a lot of money since we went on the cruise...like my parents wouldn't let us walk around with no shoes on...lol there was also a hole in the bathroom door and the shower drain was clogged...but w/e...lol! I got more tan over those 2 days then i got on The cruise (((SCORE!!!!!))) And we went to the beach with family friends (alyssa the grl i wrote about last time) it was soooo funnn!! Its in Spring Lake on the Jersey shore (its not a lake though so i dunno why they call it spring lake) lol i'm tired so i'm gonna go ttyl mwa PeAcE

xox EmC xox

Bored right now....went to sarahs last night it was soooo much fun! I'm hanging out with her later too lol yay! i'm so bored i'm gonna go ttyl Mwa PeAcE

xox Erica

Team adventure everyone! Not too bad!! Going to sarahs soon, i'll update later!mwa PeAcE

xox EmC xox

Tonight was my dads championship game...they were losing 9-1 and they came back in the second to last inning and won the whole thing!!!!!!!! Through out the whole season they only lost 2 games!!! It was awesome...so I was hanging out with my Friends Ally and Alyssa..they're family friends but they've both become my really good friends...they're the ppl i know that make it obvious that they like someone...ally liked this guy and they would like wisper and giggle about it right in front of him...it was so funny-- at the game it was pouring allll day but it was still soo fun-- they almost cancelled it and if they did then they'd have to forfeit the nexxt day cuzz they wouldn't have enough players and they woulda lost the championship but we carried on with the game later when it stopped raining-- then it started raining again but we kept going...it was sooooo fun...so they're team sponser is the muscoot restuarant its like a shack (lol) but the food good-- so Ally Alyssa and I were hanging out and Ally called her b/f from rhode islandd....who she was planning on cheating on which was badddddd but w/e...i had a funn night...except all the parents were like drunk which was kinda weird..lol well i'm gonna go talk to ppl and watch the Olympics....ttyl mwa PeAcE

xox EmC xox

Today I went shopping for jeans..i went early cuz i can't ever find my size if i go right when the season starts...I also got some cute sweaters and stuff like that....we spent a bit too much $$ but oh well....=] lol! Everyone know what team they're on except me!! I haven't gotten mine ye =[...ahhh!! lol it's making me more nervous...well i'm gonna go ttyl mwa PeAcE

xox EmC xox

Woke up at 12:30  =] hung out...it was pouring like crazy! So then my mom took me to the library and there wasnt anything good there so i went to borders (I dunno why i'm so into reading all of a sudden lol) then we went to the super market and i got a cofee coolata thing at dunkin doughnuts..I LOVE those things....so then i read (like the loser that i am) and i'm already on page 82 (wow i'm weird) so now i'm extremely bored....so i'm gonna go ttyl mwa PeAcE

xox EmC xox

Well, 2 nights ago i went to Bretts house for his birthday...it was sooo much funn!! He got a cell phone which is not fair...and he rubbed it in my face the whole time...ya isn't he nice...lol j/k j/k...so we just hung out and had dinner and ate cake and opened presents and stuff like that...it was cool...so then i went home at like 10:30 i had a really fun night!! My grandma was over so i was with her the rest of the night and then the next morning she went home. Then Brett and I were text messaging each other which was funn!!!! woo hoo!!! Then my mom and I went to see Princess Diaries 2....I liked it a lot but i liked the 1st one better...it was still really good though...and then that night my dad and i got into a GINORMOUS fight...so i went to carolines house and then i came home and hung out with my brother...i stayed up until like 2 AM lol but it was funn i got to spend some time w/ him! So the nexxt morning we both woke up at 12! lol and my mom and i went to get our nails done and then we went home and i was really bored..then my dad came home and we worked the fight out and now my parents are out and my brother has a friend over and i'm watching MY BIG FAT GREEK WEDDING...veryyyyyy good movie!!!!!!!!!!!! Lol! so i'm gonna go since the movies paused! TTYL mwa PeAcE

xox EmC xox
I hate my dad ...o and i went to bretts house yesturday for his birthday and it was really fun-- thats all i'm able to say now i'll update later 143 Brett

Haven't updated in a while! Yesturday was the last day of camp (tear tear) we went to the Yankee game!!!!!!!!!! They one against the Oakland A's...the score was 5-1....nicee :-]....I wentt to the movies today- saww a Cinderella story, cried my eyes out again...lol that was the second time I saw that movie...Ya i'm a loser... I gott a haircut Its about shoulder length with layers...i like it my hair was getting too long. I'm still trying to figur out what to gett Brett for his birthday...ahh its so hardd!!Anyway..hmmmm what else should I write....I dunno but i'm bored so i'm gonna go ttyl mwa PeAcE

xox EmC xox

Today we went to the movies for camp-- we had a choice of spiderman2, Irobot, or a cinderella story, me and a bunch of friends went to see a cinderella story (haha i know) I know its seems loserish but it was reeeeaaaaaaaaaaalllllllyy good...lol I cried so hard it was so funny....literally I was like balling.....haha so then natalie and I went into this picture sketch thingy-- It was really cool! lol my momm was like omg it looks so good...it kinda sorta looked like a professional picture- so then we had a hott miserable buss ride home and natlie told me her theory- When u die you go to heaven and live for all eternity and then i said well when the world blows up everyone goes to heaven so its like earth on heaven all over again! But..forever isnt that freaky?? ahhh it scared me! I'm so madd i really want ice cream but my brother ate it all and he ate all the cheese doodles and all the oreos...theres no good food leftt! I'mm madd...lol well i'm gonna go now ttyl mwa PeAcE

xox EmC xox

Well, today my parents told me i cant go to Mars2112 with camp cuz of the high alert terrorists attacks..i was upset for 2 reasons...1) the danger of NYC 2) everyones going and i cant 3) my mom and i were supposed to go into the city to see Jessica simpson but we cant...so all today i was madd at my parents....hugge fight...then my dadd came home and he was supposed to practice with me for softball but he decided that he didnt want to...of course....but he bought me a new disc mann so i shouldnt complain. Caroline V. came home fromm campp today!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! YAY!!!! shes coming over soonn....yayayayayaya!! lol srry...well i'm gonna go talk to ppl online! ttyl PeAcE mwa!

xox EmC xox
I juss woke up...meaning its the nexxt day and I still have Krazy Glue/ Nail Glue on my hands....

Today I saw Usher live in the city!! It was sooo cool!!! OMG yay!!! lol I hadda wake up at 5 am though....ugggh the small price to pay...then my mom and I met my aunt for lunch cuzz she works in that city that was funn!!! And like 5 minutes ago i juss got screamed at! woo hoo!! Ya..i go permenant nail glue all over the desk and all over my hands cuz the bottle decided to leak for no reason....so now i'm like scrubbing my hands with a sponge and my mom got most of the stuff that got on her hands off...if my dad finds out i'm fucked for life! ugggg get me outta here!! lol this glue is nasty and reallly pissing me off....it feels soooo gross and i cant find the remover i need for it...just my luck! Anyway...I gtg work on this retarded annoying glue that wont come off!! ttyl PeAcE mwa

xox Erica

Today we were supposed to go on this cool tour thingy for camp but we got stuck in traffic so we were late and we missed it...it was not reffundable or anything and it was in the city so we drove all the way there for noghtin..it sucked all we did was go to the gift shopp and i didnt evenn have any money :'[...I got a letter from caroline (neighbor) shes in camp and i sent her one back.....I miss the cruise.haha i wanna go back! I miss the 24/7 foood!! haha yah i'm a loser...I dunno if i wrote this laready but i talked to brett :-] yay! It was about time! lol..tommarrow we're going to an IMAX movie and the palisades mall..i have a feeling we wont really get to shopp though..i hope we do!! That would be funn! Well i gtg ttyl..i think i'm talking my braids out tonight xox mwa

xox Erica

I juss got back from my cruise!!! OMG it was the weirdest trip ever...first we were in a storm so the boat like tipped and everything went flying, ppl fell plates fell and shattered forks and knives went everywhere chairs flew and when the boat tipeed back everyone was silent it was FREAKY....ok so then some guy had a heart attack so we had to stop in bermuda as an emergency but we didnt get off the boat or anything...that made us get home 5 hours later then we were supposed to...then some lady fell and smashed her head on a table and strated bleeding...so as u can see it was like the danger boat! lol It was really funn though....everyone on the islands had the YA MON accents...lol the islands were gorgeous!! OMFG! I went to the Yankees game Thursday night..talk about KICK ASS!! Yankees swept the Red sox in a 3 game series! (Swept means won all of them) It was a tie game most of the time 3-3 and in the 12th inning redsox scored one run. The Yankees soon came up 2 runs when John Farhety Got an RBI Double..Usually John isnt good with the bat. It was amazing!!The game went into 13 innings and i got home at 1 in the morning. Jeter and A-rod made amazing plays! Jeter went to cath a fly ball and he Flew into the crowd FULL SPEED to catch the ball. He was bleeding and had to get stitches but he still made the out!! A-rod made an amazing play also!! He caught the ball on a bad hop, stepped on third, threw it home, and Posada threw it to second. The only reason it wasnt a triple play was cuz the guy that ran to third was the same guy that ran home. It was great! I had one of the best nights of my life...They say that that's been the best baseball game this year and maybe even in like 3 years! It's Great. Padro Martinez started for the Red sox and every yankee fan hates him so whenever someone on the yankees would score a homerun the crowd would tease him and we'd all go Paaaaaaadro Paaaaaadro it was soooooo funny! And also the crowd would cheer 1918, 1918 cuz thats the last time the red sox won the world series....So in the end, the Yankees won 5-4 and swept them away!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! hahahaha i had a great time! Well i gtg ttyl xo mwa

xox Erica
